Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
We are reaching out to remind you that your installation will be taking place tomorrow: {!Opportunity.Installation_Start_Date__c}
As a reminder:
We will be arriving between 8 AM- 11 AM to get started on your solar energy system.
Please have a trusted individual home for the entirety of the install
Remove all vehicles,obstructions, and personal items from the driveway.
Please do a quick walk-through in the yard to ensure all animal waste is disposed of.
In case of an emergency or scheduling conflicts, please notify us immediately by calling or emailing us. Otherwise, we look forward to getting your system installed tomorrow!
Thank you,
